Experience

Teremok Marine Lodge is situated in beautiful Umhlanga, one of the most popular beach destinations on Durban’s north coast.
Located near a handful of excellent swimming beaches & within driving distance of popular attractions like uShaka Marine World & Gateway shopping complex, Teremok is an ideal base from which to explore the surrounding area.
This 5-star boutique hotel offers exceptional service, individually decorated suites & a wellness spa that offers a range of relaxing treatments, making this a wonderful choice for honeymooners or romantics who are looking for a little luxury & pampering.

Stay

All 8 suites are unique in design & feature air-conditioning, private balconies & en-suite bathrooms with large rain showers & freestanding baths.
There is a communal lounge & bar area where guests can relax, as well as a well-stocked library with books & magazines. Teremok Marine’s wellness spa specializes in mineral salt scrubs & body massages to leave you truly rejuvenated.
Other hotel facilities include a sparkling swimming pool, fitness centre & hair/beauty salon.

Activities

Guests staying at Teremok Marine Lodge can have their pick from their on-site facilities. Take a dip in their swimming pool, enjoy a relaxing massage from the wellness centre, read a book from the library or work up a sweat at the gym.
The nearby uShaka Marine World provides fun for the entire family & exciting day tours can also be arranged.

subfolders.title: Canelands Beach Club & Spa
subfolders.description: The laidback Canelands Beach Club & Spa boasts a spectacular location overlooking the beach at Salt Rock on the subtropical Kwazulu-Natal coast.   The charming town of Ballito is nearby & King Saka International Airport is only a 15-minute drive away, making this an ideal base from which to explore the surrounding area or as an overnight stay en route to the Battlefields or Phinda Game Reserve.

subfolders.title: The Oyster Box
subfolders.description: The stylish Oyster Box is perched on the edge of the Indian Ocean & offers discerning travellers an elegant retreat close to many of Durban’s top attractions. The hotel is a fusion of old-world charm & modern-day convenience, boasting 2 swimming pools (one with an ocean view & the other one in the gardens that is for over 12’s only), a spa with jacuzzi & hammam as well as a fully-equipped fitness centre.

subfolders.title: Zimbali Resort
subfolders.description: Zimbali Resort is situated inside the elite Zimbali Coastal Estate on the beautiful Dolphin Coast in Kwazulu-Natal. The resort boasts sensational views of the Indian Ocean & offers its guests a 5-star service with the greatest attention to detail.
